con:request.name: 2.RetrievePNR
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Request" xmlns:rad1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Reservation.Request"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <tem:RetrievePNR> <!--Optional:--> <tem:RetrievePnrRequest> <rad:SecurityGUID>${Pre_reqRun_Create_OW_Interline_1AT_1CHD_1INF#securityToken}</rad:SecurityGUID> <rad:CarrierCodes> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <rad:CarrierCode><rad:AccessibleCarrierCode>${#Project#TS_CarrierCode}</rad:AccessibleCarrierCode></rad:CarrierCode> </rad:CarrierCodes> <!--Optional:--> <rad:ClientIPAddress xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <!--Optional:--> <rad:HistoricUserName xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <rad1:ActionType>GetReservation</rad1:ActionType> <rad1:ReservationInfo> <rad:SeriesNumber>299</rad:SeriesNumber> <rad:ConfirmationNumber>${Pre_reqRun_Create_OW_Interline_1AT_1CHD_1INF#ConfrimationNum}</rad:ConfirmationNumber> </rad1:ReservationInfo> </tem:RetrievePnrRequest> </tem:RetrievePNR> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: 3.RetrieveFareQuote
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <tem:RetrieveFareQuote> <tem:RetrieveFareQuoteRequest> <rad:SecurityGUID xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Request">${Pre_reqRun_Create_OW_Interline_1AT_1CHD_1INF#securityToken}</rad:SecurityGUID> <rad:CarrierCodes xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Request"/> <rad:CurrencyOfFareQuote xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Pricing.Request.FareQuote">CAD</rad:CurrencyOfFareQuote> <rad:PromotionalCode xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Pricing.Request.FareQuote"/> <rad:IataNumberOfRequestor xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Pricing.Request.FareQuote"/> <rad:CorporationID xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Pricing.Request.FareQuote">0</rad:CorporationID> <rad:FareFilterMethod xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Pricing.Request.FareQuote">NoCombinabilityAllFares</rad:FareFilterMethod> <rad:FareGroupMethod xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Pricing.Request.FareQuote">WebFareTypes</rad:FareGroupMethod> <rad:InventoryFilterMethod xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Pricing.Request.FareQuote">Available</rad:InventoryFilterMethod> <rad:FareQuoteDetails xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Pricing.Request.FareQuote"> <rad:FareQuoteDetail> <rad:Origin>${Pre_reqRun_Create_OW_Interline_1AT_1CHD_1INF#Origin}</rad:Origin> <rad:Destination>${Pre_reqRun_Create_OW_Interline_1AT_1CHD_1INF#Destination}</rad:Destination> <rad:UseAirportsNotMetroGroups>true</rad:UseAirportsNotMetroGroups> <rad:UseAirportsNotMetroGroupsAsRule>true</rad:UseAirportsNotMetroGroupsAsRule> <rad:UseAirportsNotMetroGroupsForFrom>true</rad:UseAirportsNotMetroGroupsForFrom> <rad:UseAirportsNotMetroGroupsForTo>true</rad:UseAirportsNotMetroGroupsForTo> <rad:DateOfDeparture>${Pre_reqRun_Create_OW_Interline_1AT_1CHD_1INF#DepartureDate}</rad:DateOfDeparture> <rad:FareTypeCategory>1</rad:FareTypeCategory> <rad:FareClass xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <rad:FareBasisCode xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <rad:Cabin xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <rad:LFID>0</rad:LFID> <rad:OperatingCarrierCode xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <rad:MarketingCarrierCode xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <rad:NumberOfDaysBefore>0</rad:NumberOfDaysBefore> <rad:NumberOfDaysAfter>0</rad:NumberOfDaysAfter> <rad:LanguageCode>en</rad:LanguageCode> <rad:TicketPackageID xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <rad:FareQuoteRequestInfos> <rad:FareQuoteRequestInfo><rad:PassengerTypeID>1</rad:PassengerTypeID><rad:TotalSeatsRequired>1</rad:TotalSeatsRequired></rad:FareQuoteRequestInfo><rad:FareQuoteRequestInfo><rad:PassengerTypeID>5</rad:PassengerTypeID><rad:TotalSeatsRequired>1</rad:TotalSeatsRequired></rad:FareQuoteRequestInfo><rad:FareQuoteRequestInfo> <rad:PassengerTypeID>6</rad:PassengerTypeID> <rad:TotalSeatsRequired>1</rad:TotalSeatsRequired> </rad:FareQuoteRequestInfo> </rad:FareQuoteRequestInfos><rad:ActionType>ReplaceFlightOnReservation</rad:ActionType><rad:LogicalFlightKey>${Pre_reqRun_Create_OW_Interline_1AT_1CHD_1INF#LogicFlightKey}</rad:LogicalFlightKey> </rad:FareQuoteDetail>
</rad:FareQuoteDetails> <rad:ProfileId xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Pricing.Request.FareQuote">0</rad:ProfileId> </tem:RetrieveFareQuoteRequest> </tem:RetrieveFareQuote> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
